oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Songwriter Session - Jamie Floyd and John Martin - 2017-12-23
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by singer songwriters Jamie Floyd and John Martin from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 23, 2017. Includes questions from the audience.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Jamie Floyd; John Martin;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments and songwriter introductions by Abi Tapia in progress /(03:27) Opening comments by John and Jamie / (03:48) Introduction of next song / (04:55) Performs Mississippi Flood (Jamie) / (08:01) Intro of next song / (10:42) Performs Cowboys Forever (John) / (13:59) Intro of next song / (16:23) Performs Trouble Get Me Off Your Mind (Jamie) / (19:51) Intro of next song / (22:12) Performs You Make Me Feel (Jamie and John) / (25:12) Intros next song / (26:33) Performs Re-gifting (Jamie and John) / (29:25) Intros the next song / (31:42) Performs Yet To Come (Jamie and John) / (34:09) Answers question about the origins of the band name Stranger Friends / (36:16) Jamie answers question about writing songs for movies / (37:14) Jamie answers question about representing other songwriters / (37:31) Intros the next song / (38:40) Performs The Blade (Jamie) / (42:12) Intros the next song / (43:47) Performs Ugly Christmas Sweater / (45:31) Final comments / (45:50) Walk-out music / (49:42) FILE END
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Floyd, Jamie; Martin, John; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
